title: PIxel 3 won't charge on cable without being turned off first
content:
When I plug my Pixel 3 in to charge, nothing happens. The cable and connection seem good and I've checked that the port is clean. The supplied USB-C earphones work.

If I turn the phone off with the cable plugged in, it starts charging immediately and then continues to charge when I turn it back on. The battery also drained from 100% to 72% overnight yesterday.

Any suggestions? Many shops are closed at the moment here in Germany due to the COVID-19 outbreak.
